title: Build fresh computer product e-commerce platform with complete user flow

requirements.text: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity, allowing users to securely log in and log out
acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in using Internet Identity
Users can log out and session is cleared
Authentication state persists across page refreshes
Unauthenticated users are prompted to log in for protected features

requirements.text: Create an admin panel that allows administrators to add, edit, and delete computer products with fields for name, description, price, category, and image

quotes: Admin panel for adding/editing computer products

acceptanceCriteria: Admin users can access a dedicated admin panel
Admins can create new products with all required fields
Admins can edit existing product information
Admins can delete products from the catalog
Product changes are immediately reflected in the customer-facing catalog

requirements.text: Build a shopping cart system that allows users to add products, adjust quantities, remove items, and view the total price
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from the product catalog
Users can increase or decrease item quantities in the cart
Users can remove items from the cart
Cart displays subtotal and total price
Cart state persists during the session

requirements.text: Implement a checkout flow that collects shipping information and processes payments, displaying contact details phone: 9315906829 and email: panerudaya11@gmail.com

quotes: Checkout system with contact details (phone: 9315906829, email: panerudaya11@gmail.com)

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page collects shipping address and contact information
Contact details 9315906829 and panerudaya11@gmail.com are displayed on the contact section
Users cannot proceed to payment without completing required fields
Order summary shows items, quantities, and total price before payment

requirements.text: Integrate Stripe payment processing to handle secure online payments with test mode support

quotes: Stripe payment integration for secure online payments

acceptanceCriteria: Stripe checkout session is created when user proceeds to payment
Users are redirected to Stripe payment page
Successful payments redirect to success page
Failed or cancelled payments redirect to failure page
Test mode allows demonstration without real payments

requirements.text: Create an order tracking system that displays order history with status updates: Pending, Processing, Shipped, and Delivered

quotes: Order tracking with status updates (Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered)

acceptanceCriteria: Users can view their order history after authentication
Each order shows status badge with current state
Orders display with order ID, date, items, and total price
Status progresses through Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered
Only authenticated users can access order history

requirements.text: Display a product catalog showcasing computer products organized by categories with product images, descriptions, and prices in INR
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a grid layout
Products are grouped by category (laptops, desktops, accessories, etc.)
Each product shows image, name, description, and price
Prices are formatted in Indian Rupees (₹)
Users can browse all available products

requirements.text: Apply a modern, professional visual design with a cohesive color scheme appropriate for a technology retail business, using clean typography and consistent spacing throughout the interface
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses a professional color palette suitable for tech retail
Typography is clean and readable across all components
Spacing and layout are consistent throughout the application
Design works well on both light and dark modes
Visual hierarchy clearly guides users through shopping flow

constraints: Must use Internet Identity for authentication, no other authentication methods
Must integrate Stripe for payments, not Razorpay or other payment providers
Contact details phone: 9315906829 and email: panerudaya11@gmail.com must be displayed on contact section
All backend logic must be implemented in a single Motoko actor
nonGoals: Advanced shipping carrier integration with live tracking
